description.value: The @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} cantrip no longer requires concentration, and its duration is increased 8 to hours. The spell ends early if you cast it again. For the duration of the spell, you can banish and resummon the blade in place of sheathing or drawing a weapon.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
